00048   LaAnimalParameterManager::LaAnimalParameterManager(QPair<LaTripleMap, int> & thePair,  AreaUnits & theAreaUnits, EnergyType & theEnergyType, QWidget* parent, Qt::WFlags fl)
00049 : QDialog(parent,fl)
00050 {
00051     //required by Qt4 to initialise the ui
00052   setupUi(this);
00053   readSettings();
00054   lblAnimalPic->setScaledContents(true);
00055   QStringList myList;
00056   LaGrass myGrass;
00057   QStringList myMapsetList = myGrass.getMapsetList();
00058   QStringListIterator myIterator1(myMapsetList);
00059   while (myIterator1.hasNext())
00060   {
00061       //append the raster names in this mapet to our full list
00062     myList << myGrass.getRasterList(myIterator1.next());
00063   }
00064     //myGrass.getRasterList(myMapsetList);
00065   cboRaster->addItems(myList);
00066   mSelectedCropsMap = thePair.first;
00067   mCommonGrazedLandValue = thePair.second;
00068   mCommonGrazingLandAreaUnits = theAreaUnits;
00069   sbCommonRasterValue->setReadOnly(false);
00070   sbCommonRasterValue->setValue(mCommonGrazedLandValue);
00071   sbCommonRasterValue->setReadOnly(true);
00072   connect(tblAnimalParameterProfiles, SIGNAL(cellClicked( int,int)),
00073       this, SLOT(cellClicked( int,int)));
00074   connect(cboAnimal, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged( int)),
00075       this, SLOT(on_cboAnimal_changed( int)));
00076     //connect(pbnMore, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00077         //this, SLOT(on_pbnMore_clicked()));
00078   refreshAnimalParameterTable();
00079     //disable these buttons unless experimental is allowed
00080   pbnImport->setVisible(false);
00081   pbnExport->setVisible(false);
00082     //populate the animals combo
00083   LaUtils::AnimalMap myAnimalsMap;
00084   myAnimalsMap = LaUtils::getAvailableAnimals();
00085   QMapIterator<QString, LaAnimal> myIterator(myAnimalsMap);
00086   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00087   {
00088     myIterator.next();
00089     LaAnimal myAnimal = myIterator.value();
00090     QString myGuid = myAnimal.guid();
00091     QString myName = myAnimal.name();
00092     QIcon myIcon;
00093     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00094     cboAnimal->addItem(myName,myGuid);
00095   }
00096   cbAreaUnits->addItem("Dunum");
00097   cbAreaUnits->addItem("Hectare");
00098     //cbSpecificLandEnergyType->addItem("KCalories");
00099     //cbSpecificLandEnergyType->addItem("TDN");
00100   setSpecificLandEnergyType();
00101   setFallowComboBox();
00102   populateFodder();
00103   refreshAnimalParameterTable();
00104 }

00111 void LaAnimalParameterManager::readSettings()
00112 {
00113   QSettings mySettings;
00114   QPoint pos = mySettings.value("mainwindow/pos", QPoint(200, 200)).toPoint();
00115   QSize size = mySettings.value("mainwindow/size", QSize(400, 400)).toSize();
00116   resize(size);
00117   move(pos);
00118 }
00119 
00120 void LaAnimalParameterManager::writeSettings()
00121 {
00122   QSettings mySettings;
00123   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/pos", pos());
00124   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/size", size());
00125 }

00127 void LaAnimalParameterManager::refreshAnimalParameterTable(QString theGuid)
00128 {
00129 
00130   mAnimalParameterMap.clear();
00131   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->clear();
00132   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setRowCount(0);
00133   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setColumnCount(2);
00134 
00135 
00136     //we do this in two passes
00137     //in the first pass we populate a qmap with all the animal parameters
00138     //we find....
00139   mAnimalParameterMap = LaUtils::getAvailableAnimalParameters();
00140 
00141     //the second pass populates the table
00142     //doing it from the map ensures that the rows
00143     //are sorted by animalparameter name
00144 
00145   int mySelectedRow=0;
00146   int myCurrentRow=0;
00147   QMapIterator<QString, LaAnimalParameter> myIterator(mAnimalParameterMap);
00148   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00149   {
00150     myIterator.next();
00151     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = myIterator.value();
00152       //qDebug(myAnimalParameter.toText().toLocal8Bit());
00153     if (theGuid.isEmpty())
00154     {
00155       qDebug() << "No default active row was requested.Assigning to myAnimalParameter.guid()!";
00156       theGuid=myAnimalParameter.guid();
00157     }
00158     if (myAnimalParameter.guid()==theGuid)
00159     {
00160       mySelectedRow=myCurrentRow;
00161     }
00162       // Insert new row ready to fill with details
00163     tblAnimalParameterProfiles->insertRow(myCurrentRow);
00164     QString myGuid = myAnimalParameter.guid();
00165     qDebug() << "Inserting animalParameter into table with guid: " << myGuid;
00166       // Add details to the new row
00167     QTableWidgetItem *mypFileNameItem= new QTableWidgetItem(myGuid);
00168     tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setItem(myCurrentRow, 0, mypFileNameItem);
00169     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myAnimalParameter.name()  + "  (" + myAnimalParameter.description() + ")");
00170     tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setItem(myCurrentRow, 1, mypNameItem);
00171       //display an icon indicating if the layerset is local or remote (e.g. terralib)
00172       //LaAnimalParameter::Origin myOrigin = myAnimalParameter.origin();
00173       //if (myOrigin==LaAnimalParameter::USERPROFILE)
00174       //{
00175     QIcon myIcon;
00176     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00177     mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00178       //}
00179       //else if (myOrigin==LaAnimalParameter::ADAPTERPROFILE)
00180       //{
00181       //QIcon myIcon;
00182       //myIcon.addFile(":/remotedata.png");
00183       //mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00184       //}
00185       //else if (myOrigin==LaAnimalParameter::UNDEFINED)
00186       //{
00187       //  mypNameItem->setTextColor(Qt::yellow);
00188       //}
00189     myCurrentRow++;
00190   }
00191 
00192   if (myCurrentRow>0)
00193   {
00194     tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setCurrentCell(mySelectedRow,1);
00195     cellClicked(mySelectedRow,1);
00196   }
00197   else
00198   {
00199     on_toolNew_clicked();
00200   }
00201   QStringList headerLabels;
00202   headerLabels << "File Name" << "Name";
00203   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(headerLabels);
00204   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setColumnWidth(0,0);
00205   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setColumnWidth(1,tblAnimalParameterProfiles->width());
00206   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->horizontalHeader()->hide();
00207   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->verticalHeader()->hide();
00208   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(1,QHeaderView::Stretch);
00209   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->sortItems(1,Qt::AscendingOrder);
00210 }

00212 void LaAnimalParameterManager::populateFodder()
00213 {
00214   tblFodder->clear();
00215   tblFodder->setRowCount(0);
00216   tblFodder->setColumnCount(4);
00217 
00218   int myCurrentRow=0;
00219   QMap<QString,LaCrop> myCropsMap;
00220   myCropsMap = LaUtils::getAvailableCrops();
00221 
00222   QMapIterator<QString, LaCrop> myIterator(myCropsMap);
00223   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00224   {
00225     myIterator.next();
00226     LaCrop myCrop = myIterator.value();
00227     QString myGuid = myCrop.guid();
00228     QString myName = myCrop.name();
00229 
00230     tblFodder->insertRow(myCurrentRow);
00231       // Add details to the new row
00232     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myCrop.name());
00233 
00234     if (mSelectedCropsMap.contains(myGuid) == true)
00235     {
00236       QPair <bool, QString> myPair = mSelectedCropsMap.value(myGuid);
00237       if (myPair.first)
00238       {
00239         QIcon myIcon;
00240         myIcon.addFile(":/status_ok.png");
00241         mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00242       }
00243       else
00244       {
00245         QIcon myIcon;
00246         myIcon.addFile(":/status_error.png");
00247         mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00248       }
00249     }
00250     else
00251     {
00252       QIcon myIcon;
00253       myIcon.addFile(":/status_error.png");
00254       mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00255     }
00256 
00257     mypNameItem->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00258     mypNameItem->setData(Qt::UserRole,myGuid);
00259     tblFodder->setItem(myCurrentRow, 0, mypNameItem);
00260       //mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00261       //create a var to hold the percentage for each selected parameter
00262       //add the crop parameters combo to the form
00263     QSpinBox * mypSpinFodder = new QSpinBox(this);
00264       //mypSpinFodder->addItem(myParameterName,myParameterGuid);
00265     QSpinBox * mypSpinGrain = new QSpinBox(this);
00266     QSpinBox * mypSpinDays = new QSpinBox(this);
00267     
00268     mypSpinGrain->setMaximum(10000);
00269     mypSpinFodder->setMaximum(10000);
00270     mypSpinDays->setMaximum(365);
00271     
00272     const int myDefaultFodderValue=0;
00273     const int myDefaultGrainValue=0;
00274     const int myDefaultDaysValue=0;
00275     
00276     mypSpinFodder->setValue(myDefaultFodderValue);
00277     mypSpinGrain->setValue(myDefaultGrainValue);
00278     mypSpinDays->setValue(myDefaultDaysValue);
00279     
00280       //myCropsMap[myGuid]=myValue;
00281     tblFodder->setCellWidget ( myCurrentRow, 1, mypSpinFodder);
00282     tblFodder->setCellWidget ( myCurrentRow, 2, mypSpinGrain);
00283     tblFodder->setCellWidget ( myCurrentRow, 3, mypSpinDays);
00284     
00285     myCurrentRow++;
00286   }
00287 }
00288 
00289 void LaAnimalParameterManager::refreshFodderTable(QString theGuid)
00290 {
00291   LaFoodSourceMap myFoodSourceMap = mAnimalParameter.fodderSourceMap();
00292   qDebug("Restoring " + QString::number(myFoodSourceMap.count()).toLocal8Bit()
00293     + " food sources into animal parameter.");
00294   for (int myCurrentRow=0; myCurrentRow < tblFodder->rowCount(); myCurrentRow++)
00295   {
00296     QTableWidgetItem * mypItem = tblFodder->item(myCurrentRow,0);
00297     QString myGuid = mypItem->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
00298     qDebug("tblFodderGuid: " + myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00299     QSpinBox * mypFodderSpinBox = qobject_cast <QSpinBox *> (tblFodder->cellWidget(myCurrentRow,1));
00300     QSpinBox * mypGrainSpinBox = qobject_cast <QSpinBox *> (tblFodder->cellWidget(myCurrentRow,2));
00301     QSpinBox * mypDaysSpinBox = qobject_cast <QSpinBox *> (tblFodder->cellWidget(myCurrentRow,3));
00302 
00303     if (myFoodSourceMap.contains(myGuid))
00304     {
00305       LaFoodSource myFoodSource = myFoodSourceMap.value(myGuid);
00306       int myFodderValue = myFoodSource.fodder();
00307       int myGrainValue = myFoodSource.grain();
00308       int myDaysValue = myFoodSource.days();
00310       qDebug() << "value from map for myFodderValue: " << QString::number(myFodderValue);
00311       qDebug() << "value from map for myGrainValue: " << QString::number(myGrainValue);
00312       qDebug() << "value from map for myDaysValue: " << QString::number(myDaysValue);
00313 
00314       mypFodderSpinBox->setValue(myFodderValue);
00315       mypGrainSpinBox->setValue(myGrainValue);
00316       mypDaysSpinBox->setValue(myDaysValue);
00317 
00318       mypItem->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
00319       qDebug() << "++++ Crop Guid in fodder Table: " << myGuid;
00320         //Q_ASSERT(mySelectedCropsMap.contains(myGuid));
00321         //QString myGuidFromSelectedMap = mySelectedCropsMap.value(myGuid);
00322         //qDebug("++-- Crop Guid from selected map: " + myGuidFromSelectedMap.toLocal8Bit());
00323         //qDebug() << "++-- Crop Guid from selected map:" << myGuidFromSelectedMap;
00324     }
00325     else
00326     {
00327       mypFodderSpinBox->setValue(0);
00328       mypGrainSpinBox->setValue(0);
00329       mypDaysSpinBox->setValue(0);
00330       mypItem->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00331     }
00332 
00333   }
00334 }

00336 void LaAnimalParameterManager::cellClicked(int theRow, int theColumn)
00337 {
00338     //note we use the alg name not the id becuase user may have customised params
00339     //qDebug("LaAnimalParameterManager::cellClicked");
00340   QString myGuid = tblAnimalParameterProfiles->item(tblAnimalParameterProfiles->currentRow(),0)->text();
00341     //qDebug("Guid is: " + myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00342   QString myFileName = myGuid + ".xml";
00343   selectAnimalParameter(myFileName);
00344 }
00345 void LaAnimalParameterManager::selectAnimalParameter(QString theFileName)
00346 {
00347     //qDebug("selectAnimalParameter Called : " + theFileName.toLocal8Bit());
00348   QString myAnimalParameterDir = LaUtils::userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath();
00349   mAnimalParameter.fromXmlFile(myAnimalParameterDir + QDir::separator() + theFileName);
00350     //
00351     //for debuggin only:
00352     //
00353   qDebug() << "-- Restoring " << QString::number(mAnimalParameter.fodderSourceMap().count()) << " food sources into animal parameter.";
00354     // end of deub section
00355   showAnimalParameter();
00356 }
00357 
00358 void LaAnimalParameterManager::showAnimalParameter()
00359 {
00360   leName->setText(mAnimalParameter.name());
00361   leDescription->setText(mAnimalParameter.description());
00362   setComboToDefault(cboAnimal, mAnimalParameter.animalGuid());
00363   sbPercentTameMeat->setValue(mAnimalParameter.percentTameMeat());
00364   checkBoxCommonRaster->setChecked(mAnimalParameter.useCommonGrazingLand());
00365   checkBoxSpecificRaster->setChecked(mAnimalParameter.useSpecificGrazingLand());
00366   sbSpecificRasterValue->setValue(mAnimalParameter.ValueSpecificGrazingLand());
00367   sbCommonRasterValue->setValue(mCommonGrazedLandValue);
00368   cbAreaUnits->setCurrentIndex(mAnimalParameter.areaUnits());
00369   cbSpecificLandEnergyType->setCurrentIndex(mAnimalParameter.energyType());
00370   grpFodderUse->setChecked(mAnimalParameter.fodderUse());
00371 
00372   refreshFodderTable();
00373 
00374   if (mAnimalParameter.fallowUsage()==High)
00375   {
00376     setComboToDefault(cbFallowUsage,tr("High"));
00377   }
00378   else if (mAnimalParameter.fallowUsage()==Medium)
00379   {
00380     setComboToDefault(cbFallowUsage,tr("Medium"));
00381   }
00382   else if (mAnimalParameter.fallowUsage()==Low)
00383   {
00384     setComboToDefault(cbFallowUsage,tr("Low"));
00385   }
00386   else
00387   {
00388     setComboToDefault(cbFallowUsage,tr("None"));
00389   }
00390 
00391     //leRasterName->setText(mAnimalParameter.rasterName());
00392 }

00410 void LaAnimalParameterManager::on_toolCopy_clicked()
00411 {
00412   qDebug("Copy toolbutton clicked");
00413   if (tblAnimalParameterProfiles->currentRow() < 0)
00414   {
00415     return;
00416   }
00417     //to clone, we get the algorithm guid that is currently selected
00418   QString myGuid = tblAnimalParameterProfiles->item(tblAnimalParameterProfiles->currentRow(),0)->text();
00419   if (myGuid.isEmpty())
00420   {
00421     return;
00422   }
00423   QString myOriginalFileName = LaUtils::userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myGuid + ".xml";
00424   LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter;
00425   myAnimalParameter.fromXmlFile(myOriginalFileName);
00426   /*
00427   int myCount = 1;
00428   while (mAnimalParameter.contains(myProfileName))
00429   {
00430     myProfileName = tr("Copy ") + QString::number(myCount++) + " of " + myAnimalParameter.name();
00431   }
00432   */
00433     //assign this layerset its own guid
00434   myAnimalParameter.setGuid();
00435   QString myNewFileName = LaUtils::userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myAnimalParameter.guid() + ".xml";
00436   myAnimalParameter.setName(tr("Copy of ") + myAnimalParameter.name());
00437   myAnimalParameter.toXmlFile(myNewFileName);
00438   refreshAnimalParameterTable(myAnimalParameter.guid());
00439   refreshFodderTable();
00440 }
00441 void LaAnimalParameterManager::on_toolDelete_clicked()
00442 {
00443   qDebug("Delete toolbutton clicked");
00444   if (tblAnimalParameterProfiles->currentRow() < 0)
00445   {
00446     return;
00447   }
00448   QString myGuid = tblAnimalParameterProfiles->item(tblAnimalParameterProfiles->currentRow(),0)->text();
00449   if (!myGuid.isEmpty())
00450   {
00451     QFile myFile(LaUtils::userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myGuid + ".xml");
00452     if (!myFile.remove())
00453     {
00454       QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Landuse Analyst"),
00455       tr("Unable to delete file \n") + myFile.fileName());
00456     }
00457     refreshAnimalParameterTable();
00458     refreshFodderTable();
00459   }
00460 }

00464   LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(cboAnimal->itemData(cboAnimal->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString());
00465   QString myAnimalPic = myAnimal.imageFile();

00467 }

00473 }
00474 
00475 void LaAnimalParameterManager::on_pbnApply_clicked()
00476 {
00477   mAnimalParameter.setName(leName->text());
00478   mAnimalParameter.setDescription(leDescription->text());
00479   mAnimalParameter.setAnimalGuid(cboAnimal->itemData(cboAnimal->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString());
00480   mAnimalParameter.setPercentTameMeat(sbPercentTameMeat->value());
00481   mAnimalParameter.setUseCommonGrazingLand(checkBoxCommonRaster->isChecked());
00482   mAnimalParameter.setUseSpecificGrazingLand(checkBoxSpecificRaster->isChecked());
00483 
00484   QString mySelectedAreaUnit = QString(cbAreaUnits->currentText());
00485   QString mySelectedEnergyType = QString(cbSpecificLandEnergyType->currentText());
00486   AreaUnits myAreaUnits;
00487   EnergyType myEnergyType;
00488 
00489   if (mySelectedEnergyType == "KCalories")
00490   {
00491     myEnergyType = KCalories;
00492     mAnimalParameter.setEnergyType(myEnergyType);
00493   }
00494   else if (mySelectedEnergyType == "TDN")
00495   {
00496     myEnergyType = TDN;
00497     mAnimalParameter.setEnergyType(myEnergyType);
00498   }
00499 
00500   if (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Dunum")
00501   {
00502     myAreaUnits = Dunum;
00503     mAnimalParameter.setAreaUnits(myAreaUnits);
00504   }
00505   else if (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Hectare")
00506   {
00507     myAreaUnits = Hectare;
00508     mAnimalParameter.setAreaUnits(myAreaUnits);
00509   }
00510 
00511   mAnimalParameter.setValueCommonGrazingLand(sbCommonRasterValue->value());
00512   mAnimalParameter.setValueSpecificGrazingLand(sbSpecificRasterValue->value());
00513   mAnimalParameter.setFodderUse(grpFodderUse->isChecked());
00514 
00515     // populate the fodder map from the table.
00516   LaFoodSourceMap myFoodSourceMap;
00517   int myRowCount = tblFodder->rowCount();
00518   for (int myCurrentRow=0; myCurrentRow < myRowCount; ++myCurrentRow)
00519   {
00520 
00521     QTableWidgetItem * mypNameWidget =
00522       tblFodder->item(myCurrentRow,0);
00523     QSpinBox * mypFodderSpinBox =
00524       qobject_cast<QSpinBox *>
00525       (tblFodder->cellWidget(myCurrentRow,1));
00526     QSpinBox * mypGrainSpinBox =
00527       qobject_cast<QSpinBox *>
00528         (tblFodder->cellWidget(myCurrentRow,2));
00529     QSpinBox * mypDaysSpinBox =
00530         qobject_cast<QSpinBox *>
00531         (tblFodder->cellWidget(myCurrentRow,3));
00532 
00533       //dont bother doing anything further if the
00534       //first widget in the row is not checked
00535     if (!mypNameWidget->checkState())
00536     {
00537       continue;
00538     }
00539     LaFoodSource myFoodSource;
00540     myFoodSource.setFodder(mypFodderSpinBox->value());
00541     myFoodSource.setGrain(mypGrainSpinBox->value());
00542     myFoodSource.setDays(mypDaysSpinBox->value());
00543     QString myGuid = mypNameWidget->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
00544 
00545     myFoodSourceMap.insert(myGuid, myFoodSource);
00546 
00547   }
00548 
00549   qDebug() << "Inserting " << myFoodSourceMap.count() << " food sources into animal parameter.";
00550   mAnimalParameter.setFodderData(myFoodSourceMap);
00551 
00552 
00553 
00554   QString myFallowUsage = QString(cbFallowUsage->currentText());
00555     //setFallowComboBox();
00556   Priority myPriority;
00557   if (myFallowUsage == "HIGH Fallow Priority")
00558   {
00559       myPriority = High;
00560       mAnimalParameter.setFallowUsage(myPriority);
00561   }
00562   else if (myFallowUsage == "MED Fallow Priority")
00563   {
00564       myPriority = Medium;
00565       mAnimalParameter.setFallowUsage(myPriority);
00566   }
00567   else if (myFallowUsage == "LOW Fallow Priority")
00568   {
00569       myPriority = Low;
00570       mAnimalParameter.setFallowUsage(myPriority);
00571   }
00572   else
00573   {
00574       myPriority = None;
00575       mAnimalParameter.setFallowUsage(myPriority);
00576   }
00577   mAnimalParameter.setRasterName(cboRaster->currentText());
00578   mAnimalParameter.toXmlFile( LaUtils::userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath() +
00579       QDir::separator() + mAnimalParameter.guid() + ".xml");
00580   refreshAnimalParameterTable(mAnimalParameter.guid());
00581   refreshFodderTable();
00582 }
00583 
00584 void LaAnimalParameterManager::setSelectedCropsMap(LaTripleMap theSelectedCropsMap)
00585 {
00586   mSelectedCropsMap = theSelectedCropsMap;
00587 }
00588 
00589 bool LaAnimalParameterManager::setComboToDefault(QComboBox * thepCombo, QString theDefault)
00590 {
00591   if (!theDefault.isEmpty())
00592   {
00593       //loop through list looking for a match
00594     for ( int myCounter = 0; myCounter < thepCombo->count(); myCounter++ )
00595     {
00596       thepCombo->setCurrentIndex(myCounter);
00597 
00598       if (thepCombo->itemData(myCounter,Qt::UserRole)==theDefault)
00599       {
00600         break;
00601       }
00602     }
00603   }
00604   else
00605   {
00606     return false;
00607   }
00608   return true;
00609 }

00615   cbFallowUsage->addItem("MED Fallow Priority", "Medium");
00616   cbFallowUsage->addItem("LOW Fallow Priority", "Low");
00617 }
